starlet.text: Elli AvrRam and Hardik Pandya ready to go public with relationship?Bollywood starlet Elli AvrRam has been long been rumoured to be dating Indian cricketer Hardik Pandya. The actress was recently spotted dropping off her rumoured beau at the airport and was also seen accompanying him to a shoot at a studio in the city. However, Sunday night saw the rumoured couple heading out together for a casual trip to the salon. Dressed in shorts and tees the stars were photographed leaving the salon together. Although Hardik didn't mind the flashing cameras, Elli ducked her head and went straight to her waiting car. The actress also covered her face to avoid being clicked. They may not have made things official yet, but their frequent joint appearances make us wonder if we can expect the announcement anytime soon.

welcome.message:
Message from the Team 

 First of all, you are awesome for downloading this app! We have worked very hard and keep working hard to provide you with some quality experience. We intend to carry a conversation with our users, so we will update you with all the information or changes that might take place.

 So keep an eye out for our message in this message section!

 And as always ENJOY!
